cause.description:
A web site can declare your virtual birth, BUT a facebook is the ultimate ID
Join here, to promote an ID for all Cyber Creatures , citizen of the only democratic medium on earth ………
1. Cyber space is the only democratic medium
2. We are Cyber Creatures and we are proud of it
3. Virtual existence can enrich your non virtual existence- in case you have one
cause.mission: Face book is a necessity for any respectable Cyber Creature
cause.name: Facebook is the Unlimate Cyber ID
